00057 function Escape($str, $chars, $no_double_escapes= TRUE)
00058 {
00059     if ($chars !== '') {
00060         $chars_array= str_split($chars);
00061         foreach ($chars_array as $char) {
00062             $esc_char= preg_quote($char, '/');
00063             if ($no_double_escapes) {
00065                 $str= preg_replace("/\\\\$esc_char/", $char, $str);
00066             }
00067             $str= preg_replace("/$esc_char/", "\\\\$char", $str);
00068         }
00069     }
00070     return $str;
00071 }
00072 
00079 function ViewError($msg)
00080 {
00081     global $ViewError;
00082 
00083     if ($ViewError === '') {
00084         $ViewError= $msg;
00085     }
00086     else {
00087         $ViewError.= "\n".$msg;
00088     }
00089 }
